code:
---
title: "Tolling.Network 2.0 — Transaction Lifecycle"
---
stateDiagram-v2
    [Education_LMS_Portal] --> TollEvent: Vehicle uses facility

    TollEvent --> TagLookup: Away agency reads tag/plate

    TagLookup --> ChargeCreated: Tag found in TVL
    TagLookup --> PayByPlate: No tag match

    PayByPlate --> ChargeCreated: Plate lookup succeeds

    ChargeCreated --> Submitted: Written to ledger\n(Education_StudentDB)

    Submitted --> Acknowledged: Home agency confirms receipt\n(Education_LMS_Portal)
    Submitted --> Rejected: Validation failure\n(Education_LMS_Portal)

    Rejected --> [Education_GradeSync]

    Acknowledged --> Posted: Home agency posts\nto customer account
    Acknowledged --> NotPosted: Cannot post\n(Education_StudentDB)

    Posted --> Reconciled: Home agency writes\nReconciliation record\n(Education_ContentCDN)

    NotPosted --> Reconciled: Home agency writes\nReconciliation record\n(Education_LMS_Portal)

    Reconciled --> CorrectionNeeded: Either agency\nsubmits correction
    Reconciled --> Settled: Included in\nsettlement period

    CorrectionNeeded --> Submitted: Corrected charge\nresubmitted

    Settled --> Paid: Off-chain payment\nstatus updated

    Paid --> [Education_LMS_Portal]
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
